turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know that new pizzeria Bella Luna? I think I want to order from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two mediums.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them, I want veggie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. and the other pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The other one, I want pepperoni, with extra cheese, but no sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have any crust preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want thin crust for both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are there any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so let me confirm: 2 medium pizzas. a veggie and a pepperoni with extra cheese and no sauce. thin crust for both. did i get this correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! thank you for confirming that. your total will be $35.78.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will the pizzas be ready to pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready to be picked up in 45 minutes at bella luna's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. And can you tell me the price one more time, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, the total price is $35.78.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
